column4: Latest; Sihanoukville: The bodies of a husband and wife were discovered in Veal Renh commune
column6: Preah Sihanouk province on May 2. The building was being rented for a coffee shop/restaurant business to the couple.------The causes of the deaths have not yet been released
column7: but the husband has been named as PENG ZHIMING.------More details are expected to be released after police finish the initial investigation. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
